Text: I wonder if it's got the tooth fairy in it along with all the other fantasies.  billions and billions of years ago, etc... you most likely should say... once upon a time...

"Evolutionary science is not only one of the greatest breakthroughs of modern science, but also an area that draws a great deal of interest on the part of students and the reading public."  hahah break though.  what a load of crap.  Break through are discoveries like Piri Reis maps that show the Antarctic was not always covered in ice during man's life. Other words no ice age, maybe only flood and ice after that. 

Evolution theory is just a political agenda.
If only we had a time machine to travel back in time and actually see this evolution.............
Evolution is proven fact... and one of the things that proves it is monkeys have learned to type and make ridiculous comments about evolution being a political agenda.
thanks for taking the time to comment bill and for the monkey info :)
Thank you very much for the Upload! The book is very clear and nice.
Porkster IS the proof we all need to show how we have (most of us hopefully) evolved away from fanciful or superstitious nonsense like "Chariots of the Gods" . Move on from the 1970's pal...
